/usr/local/cuda-12.8/bin/nvcc -forward-unknown-to-host-compiler -O3 -DNDEBUG --generate-code=arch=compute_75,code=[compute_75,sm_75] -Xcompiler=-fPIC -Wno-deprecated-gpu-targets -shared -dlink --options-file CMakeFiles/cudaviz.dir/deviceObjects1.rsp -o CMakeFiles/cudaviz.dir/cmake_device_link.o --options-file CMakeFiles/cudaviz.dir/deviceLinkLibs.rsp -L"/usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu" -L"/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu"
